thread.title: Couple's urgent search for live-saving operation
thread.title_full: Couple's urgent search for live-saving operation | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Couple's urgent search for live-saving operation
text:
Debbie needs an urgent operation to make her neck stable One couple's urgent search for a surgeon and enough cash to complete a life-saving operation has begun in Kent.
Debbie Rocke risks dying from a heart attack or stroke unless she has an urgent surgery - as Abigail Bracken reports.
Play video Last updated Mon 13 Feb 2017 Read more 4 updates Kent mother's desperate search for life-saving surgeon Health
